title: IT Infra Help Desk
caption: Distributed virtual IT infrastructure for scalable computing
overview: We offer you a single point of connection between the service provider and users for day to day operations. A typical service desk handles incidents (service disruptions) and service requests (routine service related tasks) as well as managing user communications for things like outages and planned service changes. It has a wide scope and provides a single place for the customer to meet all of their IT needs.
solTitle: Comprehensive solutions transforming the way your business operates

services.title: Data Center AMC
services.content: The aim is to provide you with Data Center Infrastructure Management services that would increase efficiencies and reduce costs. We will handle the annual maintenance of your Data Center as per your needs and compliance requirements.

services.title: The primary point of contact
services.content: Our main aim is to ensure the help desk provides your organization assistance in monitoring / owning incidents, addressing user requests. Additionally, the service desk often also has an active role in capturing change requests, maintaining 3rd party support contracts, managing software licenses, and assisting with problem management.

services.title: Communication Channel
services.content: Providing communication channel between other service management functions and the user community.
